availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Julia Ann Mitchel White in Ohio County, Kentucky, on October 24, 1839. Father of Mary White, Sylvester White, James R. White, William A. White, Joseph White, Erasmus S. White, Nancy E. White, Charles A. White, Martha B. White, and Christopher White. Farmer in Ohio County in 1850. Farmer in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 1, p. 38B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Caney, p. 732.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Caney, p. 350A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 79.
"Walker White (1814-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #111750180, accessed October 17, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/111750180.
